<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <style>
        *{
    margin:0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    background-color: #000;
}

#canvas1{   
    position:absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
    border: solid 2px #fff;
    width: 500px;
    height:530px;
}


</style>
    <title>Loin page</title>
</head>
<body>

    <canvas id="canvas1" ></canvas>
    <script>
const myImage= new Image();
myImage.src='data:image/jpeg;base64,';

myImage.onload=()=>{
    const canvas = document.getElementById('canvas1');
    const ctx=canvas.getContext('2d');
    canvas.width=500;
    canvas.height=530;
    ctx.globalAlpha=1;
    ctx.drawImage(myImage,0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);
    const pixels= ctx.getImageData(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);
    ctx.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height)
    let particles=[];
    const numberOfParticles=5000;
    let mappedImage=[];
    for(let y =  0 ; y < canvas.height; y++ ){
        let row=[];
        for(let x = 0 ; x < canvas.width ; x++){
            const red=pixels.data[(y*4*pixels.width)+(x*4)];
            const green=pixels.data[(y*4*pixels.width)+(x*4)+1];
            const blue=pixels.data[(y*4*pixels.width)+(x*4)+2];
            const alpha=pixels.data[(y*4*pixels.width)+(x*4)+3];
            const brightness=calculateRelativeBrightness(red,green,blue);
            const cell=[
                cellBrightness=brightness,
                color=`rgb(${red},${green},${blue},${alpha})`
            ];
            row.push(cell);
        }
        mappedImage.push(row);
    }
    function calculateRelativeBrightness(red,green,blue){
        return Math.sqrt(
            (red * red)*.299 +
            (green * green)*.587 +
            (blue * blue)*.114
        )/100;
    }
    class Particle{
        constructor(){
            this.x=Math.random()* canvas.width ;
            this.y=0;
            this.size=Math.random()*1.5 +1;
            this.velocity=Math.random()*3 +2 ;
            this.speed=0;
            this.position1=Math.floor(this.y);
            this.position2=Math.floor(this.x);
            this.color=['red','blue','green'];
            this.c;
        }
        update(){
            this.position1= Math.floor(this.y);
            this.position2=Math.floor(this.x);
            this.speed=mappedImage[this.position1][this.position2][0];
            this.c=mappedImage[this.position1][this.position2][1];
            let movement= (2.55 - this.speed) + this.velocity
            // let movement= (this.speed ) + this.velocity
            this.y += movement;
            if(this.y >= canvas.height){
                this.y=0;
                this.x=Math.random()* canvas.width ;
            }
        }
        draw(){
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.fillStyle=this.c;
            ctx.arc(this.x,this.y,this.size,0,Math.PI*2);
            ctx.fill();
        }
    }
    function init(){
        for(let i = 0 ; i < numberOfParticles ; i++){
            particles.push(new Particle());
        }
    }
    init();
    function animate(){
        ctx.globalAlpha=.05;
        ctx.fillStyle='#000';
        ctx.fillRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);
        ctx.globalAlpha=.2;
        particles.forEach(particle=>{
            particle.update();
                ctx.globalAlpha=( particle.speed  )*.2;
            particle.draw();
        });
        requestAnimationFrame(animate);
    }
    animate();
    

    
}
    </script>
</body>
</html>
